title: Pacodellama
author: Pacodellama
created_time: August 07, 2023, 10:23:37 AMLast edit: July 18, 2024, 08:48:07 AM by Pacodellama
content: Hello,Our project has been running for about a year, and we keep working hard to develop it further.Our achievements:Token creation | Deposit/Withdrawal System | Dice | Lottery | Staking | Referral | Faucet | BridgeThe foundation of our platform is complete, and we are now looking for funding and further development to become a full-fledged DeFi/GameFi platform. If you are interested, send me a message here or on Telegram/Twitter.- Visit our website: https://pacodellama.org/- Try our DApp: https://paco.finance/- Whitepaper: https://pacodellama.org/whitepaper.pdf- Buy $Paco on Dexview: https://www.dexview.com/bsc/0xe1d0065c4cd16C14C539547bac404cA6F586b8ce- Buy $Paco on Pancakeswap: https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0xe1d0065c4cd16C14C539547bac404cA6F586b8ce- Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/pacodellamadefi- Telegram: https://t.me/PacoDeLlama- Roadmap: https://x.com/pacodellamadefi/status/1811066429149487143/photo/1

comments.author: lightbit
comments.body: Hello, team! Your project sounds ambitious and promising. Could you share more details about how the revenue-sharing system will work within your platform? Specifically, how will users' $PACO token holdings translate into rewards? Also, as you aim to distinguish $PACO from typical meme coins, could you elaborate on the real-world utility and value that your project offers? Looking forward to learning more about your vision.
